ag_description:
We create Analytics solutions that offer an accelerated minimum viable product in any client engagement. This allows clients to evaluate within weeks (2-4 weeks) and assess the path forward in their data analysis journey than wait for months and serious $$ spend before they see any tangible results. 
 
Based mostly around open source technologies, our offering would be affordable and easy to implement. Our solution would support cloud based deployments, and standard industry development practices like REST APIs etc. 

We are a group of highly motivated individuals from diverse professional backgrounds, with several years of experience working with start-ups to large global companies.  We have come together with the objective of using our collective skills to bid for projects that interest us, and where we feel we can add more value, based on our areas of expertise.
dev_blurb:
I am a full stack data engineer who enjoys working with data and technologies, implementing practical end to end data solutions that help businesses put their data to work, to answer business questions and solve business problems. 

Specifically, I develop the following to achieve the above goals:
-  Data collectors that extract data from the input sources. This may also involve merging the client's metadata (internal domain data) with external 3rd party data sources such as data from Google Analytics, social media or even publicly available data (Ex: Zillow)
- Perform data masking or obfuscation if necessary
- Process the input data using Python and Apache Spark (as an example)
- Persist them in a database (NoSQL, or relational). Documentation of the mapping from the source data to target database schemas from where further analysis can be done. 
- Perform targeted data analysis that meets the client's objectives. This may involve descriptive and predictive analysis on the data (A popular use case for descriptive analytics involves core KPI dashboards, and for predictive analytics involves forecasting using historical data) 
- Design UI dashboards, and code front-end apps on NodeJS/AngularJS/D3 that deliver the data and visualizations which help us answer the questions that prompted the data engineering effort
- Deploy the solution to AWS or the Google Cloud
- Document/create user stories, specifications for product development, solution approaches and design documentation that can be consumed by a technical audience for implementation.

In my previous jobs, I have also been a product manager and an application architect and have worked with employers such as AT&T, Inc., a large corporation to a much smaller consulting firm like Saggezza, Inc. I have a bachelor’s and a master’s degree in Computer Science and Engineering.

Languages (in use actively for the last 6 months): Java, Python, Javascript 
Frameworks, Technologies & Tools (in use currently): Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, HDFS, Amazon S3,  NodeJs, D3 (plotly, leaflet), Highcharts , NoSQL databases (Couchbase,Amazon’s DynamoDB, MongoDB), SQL (MySQL, Postgres, Oracle, MS SQL Server,Amazon Redshift),  Google Analytics APIs.
Cloud Environments: AWS, Google Cloud
Other: (Languages and Frameworks used until 6 months ago) Java, Scala, Play Framework, AWS APIs for developers

dev_blurb:
I am a software engineer with more than 12+ years of professional experience and several years of scientific multidisciplinary research experience which involved data analysis from various domains, from physics to cardiology. 

I am an expert in web information retrieval, web crawling and scraping, data normalization, data science applications, structuring unstructured data, text analysis. My main areas of expertise are: Python, PHP, JAVA, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Machine Learning areas like NLP, Data Mining, Recommendation Systems, Document Classification. I have rich experience in both writing functional scripts and system architecture design. 

Over the last ten years I have developed hundreds of scraping scripts/applications and several custom topical search engines, including news search based on perspectives, recipe search for ingredients in the fridge and health conditions, IT job search for easy team building with complementary skills, etc. 

By learning about IR, I got good at SEO. And vice versa, by experimenting, reading papers and patents from Google, Yahoo, Microsoft, etc, optimizing dozens of websites, through SEO I learned a bit about IR as well  :)

I do SEO audit where I focus on crucial issues and changes with most impact and ROI. I brought several websites from 0 to 100k+ visits per month with on-page SEO and very little or no off-page SEO. In my keyword research I use six tools made by Google or based on Google data, three tools I developed (two using machine learning), and several other well know keyword tools. However, I do not overwhelm you with thousands of phrases found, but select only the top ones most useful for increasing rankings of your particular site based on its current SERP rankings. Social media became quite important for SEO, so when needed I can help with social media marketing, specifically Instagram marketing. 

For the NetflixPrize competition I independently came up with a common sense approach to collaborative filtering, named by others 'Slope One'. 

I combine my algorithms and open source packages and add a bit of my own twist to them to solve the problems I encounter. 

In the spare time I work on researching and developing educational software and collaboration tools, and participate on specialized conferences with such inspiring people like collaborators of the late inventor of "The Mother of All Demos". My first web project was a graph based discussion forum for brainstorming, first one of the kind and, to the extent of my knowledge, dozen years later still the only one. 

Have done work with Multi Agent Simulations, and the emergence of complex patterns from simple behavior changes. 

In addition to widely known ML / numeric libraries (NLTK, Scikit, NumPy, Gensim, etc.) I also use less known and proprietary NLP / ML packages.

skill.skl_description: Big data is a blanket term for any collection of data sets so large and complex that it becomes difficult to process using on-hand database management tools or traditional data processing applications.
A database administrator (short form DBA) is a person responsible for the installation, configuration, upgrade, administration, monitoring and maintenance of physical databases.
Database design is the process of producing a detailed data model of a database.
Electronic commerce, commonly known as e-commerce refers to the buying and selling of products or services over electronic systems such as the Internet and other computer networks.

Apache Hadoop is a software framework that supports data-intensive distributed applications under a free license. It enables applications to work with thousands of nodes and petabytes of data. Hadoop was inspired by Google's MapReduce and Google File System (GFS) papers.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
Linux is a Unix-like computer operating system assembled under the model of free and open source software development and distribution.
MySQL is a relational database management system (RDBMS) that runs as a server providing multi-user access to a number of databases.
nginx (pronounced engine-x) is a Web server and a reverse proxy server for HTTP, SMTP, POP3 and IMAP protocols, with a strong focus on high concurrency, performance and low memory usage.
Odoo is a suite of open-source business apps written in Python and released under the AGPL license.

skill.skl_description: "Appium is an open source test automation framework for use with native, mobile Web, and hybrid mobile apps. It uses Node.js and drives iOS and Android apps via the WebDriver JSON wire protocol."
Behavior-driven development (or BDD) is an agile software development technique, focusing on obtaining a clear understanding of desired software behavior through discussion with stakeholders.

C# (pronounced see sharp) is a multi-paradigm programming language encompassing strong typing, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented (class-based), and component-oriented programming disciplines.

Cucumber is a tool for running automated acceptance tests written in a behavior driven development (BDD) style. Cucumber is written in Ruby programming language. Cucumber allows the execution of feature documentation written in business-facing text.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
Jenkins, previously known as Hudson, is an open source continuous integration tool written in Java.

Regression testing is any type of software testing that seeks to uncover new errors, or regressions, in existing functionality after changes have been made to a system, such as functional enhancements, patches or configuration changes.
Selenium is a portable software testing framework for web applications. Selenium provides a record/playback tool for authoring tests without learning a test scripting language (Selenium IDE).

Selenium WebDriver is the successor to Selenium RC, a portable software testing framework for web applications. Selenium WebDriver accepts commands and sends them to a browser. This is implemented through a browser-specific browser driver, which sends commands to a browser, and retrieves results.

Test automation is the use of software to control the execution of tests, the comparison of actual outcomes to predicted outcomes, the setting up of test preconditions, and other test control and test reporting functions.

ag_description:
For you we will develop the solution which will help you recognize, react and engage your customers and, thus, enhance your customer experience, faster than your competitors do.

Our team will help you create an exceptional digital experience to enhance your customer-centric business and meet your users’ constantly increasing data-centric demand.

Profile Summary:

Business Support System development for customer-centric companies from telco, healthcare, logistics and other customer service domains.
2 R&D centers 
Since 2009

90+ talented staff, including experts in business analysis, development, testing, account and project management

Expertise: Python-based Web front-ends, Java backend development, Telecom development and integration, software product management, business analysis.

Projects developed: Customer Service / Self-Care / CRM platforms, enterprise backend platform, loyalty/ discount program solution, analytical DBMS, logistics and financial solutions.

Technologies:
Java: Spring framework, EclipseLink, Eclipse MOXy, JPA, JSP, Vaadin, JAX-WS, JAX-RS, Apache CXF, Hadoop, Map-Reduce, AOP, Liferay, Groovy, JCA, JMX, JGit, FreeMarker/Velocity, EhCache/Terracotta, JMS, jSMPP, GWT, OSGI, Apache Aries Blueprint, JSON, SOAP.
Python: Django, FeinCMS, South, Celery, Redis, Jinja2, Sphinx, SASS, JSON, SOAP.
JavaScript: plain JS, jQuery.
Build & Automation Tools: Gradle, Maven, Ant, Fabric, Ansible, Jenkins.
Artifacts repository: Maven, Ivy.
Test tools: SOAP-UI, Selenium, LoadComplete, TestComplete.
SCM: git, mercurial, svn.
Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle DB, HBase, MySQL, Sybase, PostgreSQL.
Search engine: Apache Solr.
ON-DEMAND TECHNOLOGIES


Work Terms

We recommend starting working together with the Architecture design. The designed architecture will provide a clear vision of the scope of work, and will help minimize the risks and thus save you time, efforts and money for further development and, besides, will allow you assess the high level of our expertise. Anyway, you will be able to use the architecture regardless whether you work with us further or not.
 
We work on hourly/ fixed price basis by the locally managed teams. 
With Agile approach, we will provide you with the next generation products and solutions, digital agility, real-time insights and shorter and optimized development cycles.

We are passionate about being the trusted IT partner and are oriented on a long-term mutually beneficial cooperation.

skill.skl_description: Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
Git is a distributed revision control system with an emphasis on speed. Git was initially designed and developed by Linus Torvalds for Linux kernel development.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
MongoDB is an open source document-oriented NoSQL database system written in the C++ programming language. It manages collections of BSON documents.
MySQL is a relational database management system (RDBMS) that runs as a server providing multi-user access to a number of databases.
The Oracle Database (commonly referred to as Oracle RDBMS or simply as Oracle) is an object-relational database management system (ORDBMS) produced and marketed by Oracle Corporation.

Python is a general-purpose, high-level programming language whose design philosophy emphasizes code readability. Python claims to combine "remarkable power with very clear syntax", and its standard library is large and comprehensive.

SoapUI is an open source web service testing tool for service-oriented architectures (SOA). Its functionality covers web service inspection, invoking, development, simulation and mocking, functional testing, load and compliance testing.
Telecommunications engineering, or telecom engineering, is an engineering discipline that brings together electrical engineering with computer science to enhance telecommunication systems.

skill.skl_description: Portable Document Format (PDF) is a file format used to represent documents in a manner independent of application software, hardware, and operating systems.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

Optical character recognition, usually abbreviated to OCR, is the mechanical or electronic conversion of scanned or photographed images of typewritten or printed text into machine-encoded/computer-readable text.
Tesseract is a free software optical character recognition engine for various operating systems.

PDF conversion is the process of converting PDF documents, an ubiquitous format for digital documents, to other formats, such as Microsoft Office formats (Word, Excel, Powerpoint), HTML, and computer graphics formats (GIF, JPEG, PNG).
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
Web scraping (also called web harvesting or web data extraction) is a computer software technique of extracting information from websites.

Web development is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet (World Wide Web) or an intranet (a private network). This can include web design, web content development, client liaison, client-side/server-side scripting, web server and network security
WordPress is a free and open source blogging tool and content management system (CMS) powered by PHP and MySQL. It has many features including a plug-in architecture and a template system.

feedback.comment:
I absolutely loved working with Xiu on my iOS app. He was actually the first freelancer I've ever worked with on oDesk, so I was initially skeptical at first about how this project would work out.

Xiu is a great communicator and communicates very quickly and regularly, asking all the right questions and implementing feedback at breakneck speed. We talked on a daily basis (oftentimes 2-3 times a day), to talk about progress and going over any questions he or I had. He ships code extremely quickly and always takes the time to make sure that I am updated on what he is doing and what the progress looks like. Xiu also had some great feedback for the design of my app, and we discussed how we could implement his feedback to make my app even better. I love the way the v1 of my app looks and feels - I'm looking forward to working with Xiu on v2!

Furthermore, I also want to emphasize how trustworthy Xiu is. On my 2nd day working with him, I accidentally released the full amount of my fixed price contract to Xiu by mistake when I intended to pay him for a milestone up-front. I messaged Xiu and prayed that somehow I would be able to get my money back (oDesk unfortunately could not cancel the transaction.) The moment that Xiu got my message, he immediately refunded me all the money (less the initial upfront amount we agreed upon.) I was immensely impressed by Xiu's speed and honesty in handling this situation.

I highly recommend hiring Xiu. He is trustworthy, communicative, and great at what he does! I feel very fortunate to have had the opportunity to work with him.

Greetings
With over 6 years experience in Mobile App Development, I have become extraordinary seasoned developer with such a deep experience across many disciplines.

Numerous contracts and great success with various clients Inspires me to get into project with flexible support and Guarantee 100% Pure success on exact deadline across the Mobile Service or Apple App Store(both of them).

My wealth of knowledge means I'm good Honest and Reliable candidate for your any kinda project related with Both IOS and Android Products for sure.

If you feel really serious about your project, Never hesitate to keep in touch with me.

dev_profile_title: Senior iOS(swift | objective-c) , Android(java) , Web Developer.

tsexam.ts_name_raw: oDesk Readiness Test for Independent Contractors and Staffing Managers

skill.skl_description: Android software development is the process by which new applications are created for the Android operating system. Applications are usually developed in the Java programming language using the Android Software Development Kit, but other development tools are available.

iOS (formerly iPhone OS) is Apple Inc.'s mobile operating system. Originally developed for the iPhone, it has since been extended to support other Apple, Inc. devices such as the iPod Touch, iPad, and Apple TV.

The iPad is a line of tablet computers designed, developed and marketed by Apple Inc., primarily as a platform for audio-visual media including books, periodicals, movies, music, games, and web content.
The iPad is a line of tablet computers designed and marketed by Apple Inc., which runs on Apple's iOS operating system.

An iPhone App is an application software developed with the iOS SDK for use with Apple, Inc.'s iPhone line of smartphones. Apps have diverse functions, including games, reference, GPS navigation, social networking, security, and advertising for television shows, films, and celebrities.
The iPhone is a line of smartphones designed and marketed by Apple Inc.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
MySQL is (as of March 2014) the world's second most widely used open-source relational database management system (RDBMS).
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
Ruby on Rails, often shortened to Rails or RoR, is an open source full-stack web application framework for the Ruby programming language.

I have been working as web developer for last 15+ years. I started my career as a full stack developer with Java on the backend. In 2011 I started working on AngularJs and immediately fell in love with the UI development. Since then I have been working usually exclusively on front ends preferably using AngularJs. I have worked on more than a dozen long term projects on Angular and I am an expert in both AngularJs 1 and 2.

AngularJS 1 and 2

Google Charts

skill.skl_description: Ajax is a group of interrelated web development methods used on the client-side to create asynchronous web applications.

AngularJS is an open-source web application framework, maintained by Google and community, that assists with creating single-page applications, one-page web applications that only require HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the client side.

Dynamic HTML, or DHTML, is an umbrella term for a collection of technologies used together to create interactive and animated web sites[1] by using a combination of a static markup language (such as HTML), a client-side scripting language (such as JavaScript), a presentation definition language (such as CSS), and the Document Object Model.

The Google Maps API allows developers to embed dynamic, draggable maps in their web applications.  It's free for sites that are freely available to the public, and there's an enterprise version for private sites.

HTML5 is a language for structuring and presenting content for the World Wide Web, and is a core technology of the Internet originally proposed by Opera Software. It is the fifth revision of the HTML standard.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
Project management is the discipline of planning, organizing, securing, and managing resources to achieve specific goals.

ag_description:
As a company we started in 2010, and picked up the most innovative segments. Back then we were looking for a niche that would allow us to leverage our experience in building scalable, cutting edge and high load applications. So listed below domains were a natural choice.

Currently we are have more then 30 engineers on our's board and we proud to admit that every engineer,manager or even data scientist have more than 9+ years of experience.

Geomotiv main areas of expertise are: 
- Ad Tech (Internet Ad tech, TV Ad tech,DSP,SSP)
- Ad Ops
- Machine learning, Neuronets
- Artificial Intelelgence 
- Natural Language processing
- Internet of Things
- Big data (Intellectual data processing, Data Intellegence)
- RTB and DMP

We are also running an Ad Ops team with more then 40 employees:
The team is experienced with: 
Facebook Ads 
Google AdWords
DoubleClick Bid Manager
DoubleClick for Publishers
Adform DSP, SSP, and DMP
The Trade Desk 
Adobe Marketing Cloud
DataXu TouchPoint
Turn DSP and many others.

Our main services:
- Full product enablement and development
- Data Intellegence 
- Full cycle web and mobile application development 
- UI\UX and Design
- Integration with internal and 3-rd party systems
- DevOps
- Outstaffing and DDT,DDC

Technical Expertise:
- Java: 2SE, Hibernate, Apache OJB, J2EE, Struts, Ant, Maven, Scala, GWT Jasper, Spring, Vaadin, Kafka, Spark, Zookeper
- Database and cloud : Oracle MS, DynamoDB, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS,  Liquibase, Google Cloud, RedShift, MapReduce, Hadoop, Hbase, Google Adx, Google BigQuery
- Front-end: HTML5, Angular.js, CSS3, Node.js, JavaScript, REST, Ajax\JSON, Bootstrap,Gulp
- PHP: Symfony 2, ZEND, Cake PHP, Laravel jQuery
- Mobile: iOS, PhoneGap, Android, Swift
- QA: Manual, Mobile, Automation, Unit 
- CI: Maven, Gradle, Bamboo, Sonar
- Design: UI, UX, Wireframes, Prototyping 
- App/Web Servers, Tomcat, Apache, Nginx

How we work:
Fixed Price Is chosen when there is a specification or project scope definition.
Time & Material For Agile projects, when the time-frames and scope of work are flexible.
Dedicated Team Allows our customers to have a remote extension of their in-house development team.

www.geomotiv.com

I have managed to work with different customers all around the globe, but in most cases from USA and Europe.

Analysis of data is a process of inspecting, cleaning, transforming, and modeling data with the goal of highlighting useful information, suggesting conclusions, and supporting decision making.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

Machine learning, a branch of artificial intelligence, is a scientific discipline concerned with the design and development of algorithms that allow computers to evolve behaviors based on empirical data, such as from sensor data or databases.
New product development (NPD) is the term used to describe the complete process of bringing a new product to market.
Project management is the discipline of planning, organizing, securing, and managing resources to achieve specific goals.

User interface design or user interface engineering is the design of computers, appliances, machines, mobile communication devices, software applications, and websites with the focus on the user's experience and interaction.

User experience design (UXD or UED) is the process of enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty by improving the usability, ease of use, and pleasure provided in the interaction between the customer and the product.
Web development is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet (World Wide Web) or an intranet (a private network).

ag_description:
We work hard to deliver high-value features early on and release code regularly and transparently for your review....INSONIX is an agency that has a deep desire to add value to business processes using technology and loves to come up with solutions for challenging scenarios.   

- May it be using advanced 3rd party APIs to compare financial advisors
- Using fedex and UPS APIs to create advanced shipping modules for warehouses
- Dashboards and Reporting systems for Asset Management in aviation and oil and gas industries
- CRM software for organizing the processes of manufacturers and reps in the food services industry

From day 1 we have been focusing on TQM techniques to achieve measurable outcomes. Over the years we have continued to fine tune our processes and weeding out in-efficiencies to come up with an agile methodology that is tried and tested to provide sure shot results. We are a ISO 9001 company.

List of our skills includes but not limited to:


> Core Java, Tomcat, Mysql, JSON, AJAX, JQuery, Javascript, JSP, Struts2 , wso2 , JavaFX , hadoop, hippoCMS, hadoop, J2ME, android, angularJS, HTML/CSS, PHP, ROR, salesforce, sharepoint, .NET , amazon cloud hosting, heroku , oracle, crystal reports, birt reports, jasper reports.

> 100% projects handled using project management tools like Jira and Redmine

> 100% developers use revision control: CVS, GIT, SVN

> Highly focused rigorous testing: unit testing, load testing, manual testing , automation testing, cross browser testing, testing on multiple devices and OS

> Libraries and Frameworks: Hibernate, Struts, Spring, Solr, Lucene, Nutch, Jersey, Grails, Groovy , Face book, JAXB, Tool twist, J Query.

> Languages: Java, C, C++, Visual Basic 6.0, Java script, AJAX, XSL, XML
    
>Database: My SQL, postgres, Oracle, MS Access, SQL, DB2, MS SQL Server, mongoDB, memcache

> IDEs and Tools: JBoss, Apache Tomcat, IBM Web sphere, IIS, Eclipse, Net beans

> Operating Systems: Windows, UNIX, Linux, Solaris


we seek providers looking for a trusted team that can write reliable and scalable software and establish strong and long-term business relationships. We are committed to work through the entire SDLC with determination and quickly take your product from local machine to our test servers to live deployment in quick time!
dev_blurb:
Though I love learning and continuous improvement, I always stick to some of the basics. The beauty of Java is that it restricts you to stick to OOPS and therefore long term maintainability of code. After many years of experience ranging from APIs, and building front end UI in angularJS, I am qualified to be called a full stack developer!

List of tools/skills that my team utilizes to deliver quality solutions includes but not limited to:

* Core Java, Tomcat, Mysql, JSON, AJAX, JQuery, Javascript, JSP, Struts2 , wso2 , JavaFX , J2ME, android, angularJS, HTML/CSS , Vue.js

* 100% projects handled using project management tools like Asana, Jira and Redmine

* 100% developers use revision control: CVS, GIT, SVN

* High focus rigorous testing: unit testing, load testing, manual testing , automation testing

* Libraries and Frameworks: Hibernate, Struts, Spring, Solr, Lucene, Nutch, Jersey,      Grails, Groovy , Face book, JAXB, Tool twist, J Query.

* Languages: Java, C, C++, Visual Basic 6.0, Java script, AJAX, XSL, XML
    
* Database: My SQL, postgres, Oracle, MS Access, SQL, DB2, MS SQL Server, mongoDB, memcache

* IDEs and Tools: JBoss, Apache Tomcat, IBM Web sphere, IIS, Eclipse, Net beans

* Operating Systems: Windows, UNIX, Linux, Solaris

I am looking for clients that are serious about their projects and want to leave their mark in industry/domain that they are targeting. Together we can!

experience.exp_comment:
Creating the vision and mission for the company. Lead by example by building a project delivery process that is sensitive to client business needs and bring financial success to our clients in relatively short period of time. 
Establish trust with clients so that we are not perceived as mere remote coders but more of a trusted partners that can contribute in bringing in real results.

Started an Education Program for young kids aged 8 to 12 years of age using lego mindstorm kits. The program was intended to teach kids engineering skills early in life but idea was pre-mature for that time. The idea failed as Parents were not ready for such a program, they were more focused in wrote learning techniques rather than real engineering skill development.

My Interests : Predective Modelling(Requirement Analaysis, Feature Engineering , Modelling and deploying) , Natural Language Processing,Computer Vision and Backend API development(Spring, Django).

skill.skl_description: Apache Kafka is an open-source message broker project developed by the Apache Software Foundation written in Scala. The project aims to provide a unified, high-throughput, low-latency platform for handling real-time data feeds.
Apache Spark is an open-source data analytics cluster computing framework.

Apache Hadoop is a software framework that supports data-intensive distributed applications under a free license. It enables applications to work with thousands of nodes and petabytes of data. Hadoop was inspired by Google's MapReduce and Google File System (GFS) papers.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

Machine learning, a branch of artificial intelligence, is a scientific discipline concerned with the design and development of algorithms that allow computers to evolve behaviors based on empirical data, such as from sensor data or databases.
MongoDB is an open source document-oriented NoSQL database system written in the C++ programming language. It manages collections of BSON documents.

Natural language processing (NLP) is a field of computer science and linguistics concerned with the interactions between computers and human (natural) languages; it began as a branch of artificial intelligence.

Python is a general-purpose, high-level programming language whose design philosophy emphasizes code readability. Python claims to combine "remarkable power with very clear syntax", and its standard library is large and comprehensive.
Scala is a multi-paradigm programming language designed to integrate features of object-oriented programming and functional programming.
TensorFlow is an open source software library for machine learning in various kinds of perceptual and language understanding tasks.

skill.skl_description: Android is an operating system based on the Linux kernel with a user interface based on direct manipulation, designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablet computers.

Android software development is the process by which new applications are created for the Android operating system. Applications are usually developed in the Java programming language using the Android Software Development Kit, but other development tools are available.
New applications are created for the Android operating system in the Java programming language using the Android Software Development Kit.
Eclipse is a multi-language software development environment comprising an integrated development environment (IDE) and an extensible plug-in system. It is written mostly in Java.
Git is a distributed revision control system with an emphasis on speed. Git was initially designed and developed by Linus Torvalds for Linux kernel development.

The Google Maps API allows developers to embed dynamic, draggable maps in their web applications.  It's free for sites that are freely available to the public, and there's an enterprise version for private sites.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

Mobile application development is the process by which application software is developed for low-power handheld devices, such as personal digital assistants, enterprise digital assistants or mobile phones.
SQLite is an ACID-compliant embedded relational database management system contained in a small (~275-kB) C programming library.

ag_description:
Senarios is a Software Development Agency having headquarters in Lahore, Pakistan and Offshore office in Maryland, US. The Agency has a team of highly skilled 
Professionals who can research, enhance and make your application look and perform the best.

If you are willing to digitize your business, finding solution to any complex software problem or looking for a development partner, Senarios can provide long-term services to you.

Here at Senarios, we expertise in:
•	Big Data
•	Real Time Saleable Applications
•	Mobile App Development
•	Web Development
•	Cloud Computing
•	Data Scraping
•	Game Development
•	IOT Solutions
•	Machine Learning
•	Computer Vision
•	Call Center Services
•	Software Testing(Manual/Automated)

Senarios Preferred Frameworks/Libraries for Big Data and Cloud Solutions:
•	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, IOT, Green Grass, Elastic Transcoder, RDS, Kinesis, ELB, Cloud Front, API Gateway, Cognito, Mobile Hub, EMR, Auto Scaler, DynamoDB, Connect, Aurora, Machine Learning)
•	Firebase

Java, Swift, Objective C, PHP, Node.js, Angular.js, ASP.NET, ReactJS, Python, ROR, C++, Javascript.

skill.skl_description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a collection of remote computing services (also called web services) that together make up a cloud computing platform, offered over the Internet by Amazon.com. The most central and well-known of these services are Amazon EC2 and Amazon S3.

Android software development is the process by which new applications are created for the Android operating system. Applications are usually developed in the Java programming language using the Android Software Development Kit, but other development tools are available.
Is a platform for web and mobile application.

iOS (formerly iPhone OS) is Apple Inc.'s mobile operating system. Originally developed for the iPhone, it has since been extended to support other Apple, Inc. devices such as the iPod Touch, iPad, and Apple TV.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
A microcontroller is a small computer on a single integrated circuit containing a processor core, memory, and programmable input/output peripherals.

Node.js is a software system designed for writing highly-scalable internet applications, notably web servers. Programs are written in JavaScript, using event-driven, asynchronous I/O to minimize overhead and maximize scalability.
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
Structured Query Language (SQL) is a programming language designed for managing data in relational database management systems (RDBMS).
Swift is a multi-paradigm, compiled programming language developed by Apple for iOS and OS X development.

ag_description:
Magora holds the keys to taking your product to a market launch - our years of technical experience and a study of your end users' needs allow us to implement a solution to your business goals. 

We value your time and your product which is why we espouse the personal approach in offshore development. In addition to a wealth of technical expertise and domain knowledge, our team members are great communicators - everyone you will work with here speaks English fluently and willingly. Expert business analysts, systems architects, UX designers, graphic designers and software engineers with a product-first approach work together to make your ideas into dollars. Welcome to Magora!
dev_blurb:
Hi there!

I am a business development manager in Magora Systems, an established bespoke development firm with HQ in Novosibirsk and supporting offices in Saint-Petersburg and London operating since 2010. Watch a video above to get to know us better!

Cisco, Yandex, Unilever, OneTwoTrip, Expensify are among our customers.

As of July 19, 2017, we have:
- 74,456 hours committed on Upwork
- 511 projects completed at an average success rate of 93%. 

I am a part of a big team that includes:

- system architects 
- backend developers (PHP, Laravel, Symfony, Yii, ASP.NET, Java, Python, C++, Node.js)
- frontend developers (AngularJS, React.js, D3.js, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, LESS)
- mobile developers (iOS, Android, Xamarin)
- QA engineers
- UI&UX, graphic designers
- project/product managers (Agile, SCRUM, Kanban, Waterfall, SDLC)
- marketing specialists (user acquisition & engagement, SEO, content marketing, promotion videos, ASO, etc.) 

I provide consultations regarding web, desktop and mobile development for both large and small IT projects. 

We take time to understand your situation, business challenges and goals, and work hard to deliver a solution that is bound to cover them.  Let's get in touch and lay the grounds for a fruitful partnership!

skill.skl_description: Agile software development is a group of software development methods based on iterative and incremental development, where requirements and solutions evolve through collaboration between self-organizing, cross-functional teams.

Android is an operating system based on the Linux kernel with a user interface based on direct manipulation, designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablet computers.

AngularJS is an open-source web application framework, maintained by Google and community, that assists with creating single-page applications, one-page web applications that only require HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the client side.
ASP.NET is a Web application framework developed and marketed by Microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic Web sites, Web applications and Web services.

iOS (formerly iPhone OS) is Apple Inc.'s mobile operating system. Originally developed for the iPhone, it has since been extended to support other Apple, Inc. devices such as the iPod Touch, iPad, and Apple TV.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
MongoDB is an open source document-oriented NoSQL database system written in the C++ programming language. It manages collections of BSON documents.
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
New product development (NPD) is the term used to describe the complete process of bringing a new product to market.

skill.skl_description: Android is an operating system based on the Linux kernel with a user interface based on direct manipulation, designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablet computers.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

Machine learning, a branch of artificial intelligence, is a scientific discipline concerned with the design and development of algorithms that allow computers to evolve behaviors based on empirical data, such as from sensor data or databases.

Mobile application development is the process by which application software is developed for low-power handheld devices, such as personal digital assistants, enterprise digital assistants or mobile phones.
MongoDB is an open source document-oriented NoSQL database system written in the C++ programming language. It manages collections of BSON documents.
MySQL is a relational database management system (RDBMS) that runs as a server providing multi-user access to a number of databases.

Node.js is a software system designed for writing highly-scalable internet applications, notably web servers. Programs are written in JavaScript, using event-driven, asynchronous I/O to minimize overhead and maximize scalability.
PostgreSQL, often simply Postgres, is an object-relational database management system (ORDBMS) available for many platforms including Linux, FreeBSD, Solaris, Microsoft Windows and Mac OS X.
Ruby on Rails, often shortened to Rails or RoR, is an open source full-stack web application framework for the Ruby programming language.

skill.skl_description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a collection of remote computing services (also called web services) that together make up a cloud computing platform, offered over the Internet by Amazon.com. The most central and well-known of these services are Amazon EC2 and Amazon S3.

Bitcoin is a payment system introduced as open-source software in 2009 by developer Satoshi Nakamoto. The payments in the system are recorded in a public ledger using its own unit of account, which is also called bitcoin.
A blockchain is a distributed database that maintains a continuously-growing list of data records hardened against tampering and revision.
Ethereum is a public decentralized blockchain-based financial computing platform, featuring smart contract functionality.

Google Cloud Platform is a cloud computing service by Google that offers hosting on the same supporting infrastructure that Google uses internally for end-user products like Google Search and YouTube.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.

ag_description:
Personalized award-winning Mobile and Web solutions for your business. Proven expertise and dozens of successfully completed projects. 

Omega-R provides full-cycle product development from business analysis to deployment and further evolution, making quality assurance an integral part of development. 

Based out of NYC, Omega-R is an international mobile development company. We have one office in New York and another one, where most of the team are based, in Yoshkar-Ola, Russia.

We design and develop highly polished iOS & Android apps for startups and enterprise clients helping them increase their revenue:

✅ SCRUM approach
✅ Business Analysis
✅ Prototyping & UI/UX design
✅ Proof of concept & Usability testing
✅ Native mobile development: iOS, Android
✅ Cross-platform development: Unity 3D, Cocos 2d-x
✅ Web services / backend development: Node, Amazon
✅ JS frameworks expertise: Angular, React
✅ Quality assurance
✅ Project management

We offer dedicated project teams for long-term collaborations and ensure transparency of actions and regular product delivery. We have 10+ years experience and over 60 employees in-house.

We can also provide you some references you can call to and ask for their experience of working with Omega-R. 

We are always ready to complete a small risk-free trial to prove our expertise.

dev_blurb:
I'm a Harvard graduate with 8 years of experience on wall street. I first worked as an investment banker at Goldman Sachs, and then achieved double digit returns managing a $300mm portfolio for a large hedge fund. While still in school, I won both the United States Math Olympiad as well as the US Computer Science Olympiad, the US's most prestigious contests in those fields.

My trading strategies were a hybrid of qualitative and quantitative so I have a strong background in both traditional corporate finance (including both fixed income instruments and equities), and in quant techniques. I'm an excel wizard having produced many dynamic excel models both as a banker and when analyzing investment opportunities as a portfolio manager. I'm also a strong data scientist and programmer, proficient in machine learning and deep learning techniques.

I like to begin every new project with a phone call, so I can best understand exactly what you need done. I take pride in completing projects on time, being detail oriented, and exceeding my client's expectations. I look forward to hearing from you.

job.as_opening_title: Software Developer Needed for Consumer Electronics Product

tsexam.ts_name_raw: oDesk Readiness Test for Independent Contractors and Staffing Managers

dev_timezone: UTC-08:00 Pacific Time (US & Canada); Los Angeles

skill.skl_description: Amazon Redshift, a hosted data warehouse product, forms part of the larger cloud-computing platform Amazon Web Services.

C# (pronounced see sharp) is a multi-paradigm programming language encompassing strong typing, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented (class-based), and component-oriented programming disciplines.
Extract, transform and load (ETL) is a process in database usage and especially in data warehousing that involves:

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
MongoDB is an open source document-oriented NoSQL database system written in the C++ programming language. It manages collections of BSON documents.

Node.js is a software system designed for writing highly-scalable internet applications, notably web servers. Programs are written in JavaScript, using event-driven, asynchronous I/O to minimize overhead and maximize scalability.

Python is a general-purpose, high-level programming language whose design philosophy emphasizes code readability. Python claims to combine "remarkable power with very clear syntax", and its standard library is large and comprehensive.
Representational state transfer (REST) is a style of software architecture for distributed hypermedia systems such as the World Wide Web.
Structured Query Language (SQL) is a programming language designed for managing data in relational database management systems (RDBMS).
Talend Open Studio is an open source data integration product developed by Talend and designed to combine, convert and update data in various locations across a business.

dev_blurb:
I am a java developer with more than 15 years of experience in the Java industry. 
I am a lead/senior developer, self-discipline, hardworking, quick learning, good team spirit and honesty. 
I can design, code, improve web and backend applications and your IT infrastructure. 
My experience include web programming both front-end and back-end, development of interactive web application, desktop and mobile applications, use of modern technologies, 

Here is a draft list of technologies I am familiar with: 

Backend Technologies: 
✓ Java, J2EE, Spring Framework (MVC, Security, Remoting etc), Hibernate, Struts 2.x,  Jasper Reports, 
✓ SOA, RESTful Services, SOAP Services, Apache CXF
✓ Deep knowledge in wide range of web-scrapping and automation technologies. 
✓ SQL and NoSQL databases. Wide experience with MySQL. MSSQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Cassandra

Front End Technlogies:
✓ Bootstrap, jQuery, AngularJS, DataTables, Extjs, jQuery Mobile etc.
✓ HTML 5, CSS 3.0, JavaScript, Responsive Web Design

experience.exp_comment:
Client facing Online Portal/Mobile Applications,	
•	Architected Client facing reporting web application from the scratch.•	 
•	Database connection pooling using Hibernate/JPA Database table designing, Write Queries, Tune database with Indexes, table partitioning, triggers, stored procedures, Materialized views etc.

•	Database table designing, Write Queries, Tune database with Indexes, table partitioning, triggers, stored procedures, Materialized views etc.

•	Used Apache Mod-JK  Jetty to embed the REST server and distribute as a service.  
•	Designed special JAVA Annotations to enhance some of the CXF functionalities for the REST services.

skill.skl_description: Agile software development is a group of software development methods based on iterative and incremental development, where requirements and solutions evolve through collaboration between self-organizing, cross-functional teams.

Android software development is the process by which new applications are created for the Android operating system. Applications are usually developed in the Java programming language using the Android Software Development Kit, but other development tools are available.
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used to describe the presentation (that is, the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.
HyperText Markup Language (HTML) is the main markup language for web pages. HTML elements are the basic building-blocks of webpages.
Inbound marketing and its opposite (outbound marketing) have two pairs of meanings depending on the context.

iOS (formerly iPhone OS) is Apple Inc.'s mobile operating system. Originally developed for the iPhone, it has since been extended to support other Apple, Inc. devices such as the iPod Touch, iPad, and Apple TV.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
a standardized non-executable file type used by computer software as a pre-formatted example on which to base other files, especially documents.

dev_blurb:
16 years as a software developer in Healthcare domain.

HIPAA Security Expert doing security assessment, identifying PHI, look for HIPAA compliance, complying HITRUST requirements, Involved in auditing, reviewing BAA with HIPAA hosting provider. 

Vastly experienced working with EMRs like Epic Care , Meditech,Mckesson’s Horizon Ambulatory Care,Practice Partner, EClinicalworks, Nextgen, Cerner, QuadraMed
MEDITECH – ABS, ADM, PCI ,AP, BAR, GL, MM, MRI, PP, SCH
MEDITECH Magic & Client Server,NPR, Data Repository

Participated in CCHIT, Drummond, Infoguard certification, Meaningful use stage 1 & stage 2 and now stage 3 certification .Consultant and implementation Developer
Cypress Testing tool
MU3 ,MIPS and NCQA consultant

EMR implementation and customization
HL7 message engine development, data parsing and digesting
MIRTH configuration and channel customization with hooks development
SOLR engine to index and process big data generated through EMR systems
UMLS data coding and concept traversing
ICD9-ICD10 migration, ICD to SNOMED mapping, CPT to SNOMED Mapping
NQF standard implementation
Lab integrations(Uni directional, Bi Directional) like LabCorp, Quest, Sunrise
State registries integration for vaccination messages ( VXU)
Instrument integrations with EMR systems
Specialized in mobile IHE profile and have strong hold on CCDA, PDQ, PDQm, PIX, PIXM, MHD and so on. I have actively worked on Mirth, Intersystem Ensemble, Iguana, Apache Camel as Integration engine and DSL.
Insurance gateway integration, 835, 837, 270, 271
Integrating PopHealth
Very Strong on Java, PHP & Rails

skill.skl_description: The .NET Framework (pronounced dot net) is a software framework developed by Microsoft that runs primarily on Microsoft Windows.
Ajax is a group of interrelated web development methods used on the client-side to create asynchronous web applications.
ASP.NET is a Web application framework developed and marketed by Microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic Web sites, Web applications and Web services.

The Facebook Platform provides a set of APIs and tools which enable third-party developers to integrate with the "open graph"   whether through applications on Facebook.com or external websites and devices.
Google Map Maker is a service launched by Google in June 2008, designed to expand the breadth of the service currently offered by Google Maps.

An iPhone App is an application software developed with the iOS SDK for use with Apple, Inc.'s iPhone line of smartphones. Apps have diverse functions, including games, reference, GPS navigation, social networking, security, and advertising for television shows, films, and celebrities.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
Linux is a Unix-like computer operating system assembled under the model of free and open source software development and distribution.
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
Ruby on Rails, often shortened to Rails or RoR, is an open source full-stack web application framework for the Ruby programming language.

experience.exp_title_raw: Implement momentum scrolling for iOS app
Phase II Web based Security Event Manager
Web application based on NodeJS/AngularJS with an Azure backend.

experience.exp_company: Exodus Comm, Cable & Wireless, Savvis Inc

dev_blurb:
Welcome to my profile! 

My name is Deyan; I am a software developer with ~10 years of experience.

I've worked at the United Nations, where I was doing various things with geo data. 

Also, for nearly 4 years, I worked at a company called Meltwater, where, among other duties, I built from scratch and pushed to production two major components of a product (I talk about that experience at http://underthehood.meltwater.com/blog/2013/02/18/starting-from-scratch-getting-to-production/).

I am a Clojure enthusiast: I give Clojure talks (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ijTKIvAiww) and participate in Clojure competitions (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1-_lP3izbE).

I've been working as a freelancer for the last 2.5 years, and love it!

As such, I build web applications. On my own, I can handle the full process:

- gathering requirements (communication is such a vital part of the software development process!), keeping track of tasks and ideas via Jira, documenting all progress

- R&D, analyzing feasibility, prototyping

- Planning for testability

- Building the backend: web crawling, collecting data from third-party APIs, cleaning data, storing data in SQL and/or noSQL, making data searchable, making data accessible via APIs, etc. (my languages of choice for building backend components are Java and Clojure)

- Building the tricky parts of the backend: I can handle some Machine Learning and some Natural Language Processing when I need to

- Building the frontend. I use jQuery in the case of a more "standard" "business" application, and ClojureScript if complex frontend functionality is needed

- Deploying the application, doing the necessary server administration. I know Linux well, and have used the Amazon Web Services

- Maintaining the application once it has real users

- The one thing with which I might need help is graphic design, although in simpler cases I can handle that on my own as well

I am looking forward to hearing about your project: maybe we could build it together!

skill.skl_description: An application programming interface (API) is a source code based specification intended to be used as an interface by software components to communicate with each other. An API may include specifications for routines, data structures, object classes, and variables.

Clojure (pronounced like "closure") is a recent dialect of the Lisp programming language created by Rich Hickey. It is a general-purpose language supporting interactive development that encourages a functional programming style, and simplifies multithreaded programming.

Subject indexing is the act of describing or classifying a document by index terms or other symbols in order to indicate what the document is about, to summarize its content or to increase its findability.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

jQuery is a cross-browser JavaScript library designed to simplify the client-side scripting of HTML. Its syntax is designed to make it easier to navigate a document, select DOM elements, create animations, handle events, and develop Ajax applications.
Linux is a Unix-like computer operating system assembled under the model of free and open source software development and distribution.

Machine learning, a branch of artificial intelligence, is a scientific discipline concerned with the design and development of algorithms that allow computers to evolve behaviors based on empirical data, such as from sensor data or databases.

Natural language processing (NLP) is a field of computer science and linguistics concerned with the interactions between computers and human (natural) languages; it began as a branch of artificial intelligence.
Structured Query Language (SQL) is a programming language designed for managing data in relational database management systems (RDBMS).
A Web crawler is a computer program that browses the World Wide Web in a methodical, automated manner or in an orderly fashion.

dev_profile_title: Web Applications Builder: Backend Dev, Frontend Dev, SysAdmin

dev_blurb:
Full stack developer with lots of experience in Grails, Java, J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, Struts, SpringBoot. Professional and academic background on architecting and building Multi-Tenant Software as a Service.

I am a member of jcabi team. jcabi is a collection of small and useful Java components, which are not big enough to make their own projects. (http://www.jcabi.com/)

I am also proficient in making bots,web crawlers, email scrapers , automation tasks based on selenium web driver/htmlunit and jsoup. I have been heralded as the "bot master" by various clients I have worked with due to my outstanding performance in automation jobs. 

My skill sets include:
* Languages:
Java, Groovy, SQL, C, Ruby, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, PHP

* Frameworks
Grails, Bootstrap, Ruby on Rails, Hibernate, Hadoop, Spring, SpringBoot, YII, Laravel

* Libraries/APIs
Java Collections, jQuery UI, jQuery, JAX-RS, Google Gson, JavaMail, Amazon API, Asterisk-Java, Selenium, HTMLUnit, Jsoup

* Databases:
  - Relational: Mysql, PostgreSQL, Oracle, DB2;
  - NoSQL: Redis, Memcached, SimpleDB;

In my case, I enjoy working with small businesses and individual decision makers to provide architectural and custom business solutions that help my clients resolve mission-critical problems, grow their business, and improve their revenue stream and profitability.

Groovy is an object-oriented programming language for the Java platform. It is a dynamic language with features similar to those of Python, Ruby, Perl, and Smalltalk. It can be used as a scripting language for the Java Platform.
Hibernate is an object-relational mapping (ORM) library for the Java language, providing a framework for mapping an object-oriented domain model to a traditional relational database.

Java Platform, Enterprise Edition or Java EE is widely used platform for server programming in the Java programming language. The Java platform (Enterprise Edition) differs from the Java Standard Edition Platform (Java SE) in that it adds libraries which provide functionality to deploy

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.
JDBC is a Java-based data access technology (Java Standard Edition platform) from Sun Microsystems, Inc.. It is not an acronym as it is unofficially referred to as Java Database Connectivity.

jQuery is a cross-browser JavaScript library designed to simplify the client-side scripting of HTML. Its syntax is designed to make it easier to navigate a document, select DOM elements, create animations, handle events, and develop Ajax applications.
The Spring Framework is an open source application framework and Inversion of Control container for the Java platform.

Bootstrap is a front-end toolkit for rapidly developing web applications from the developers of Twitter. It is a collection of CSS and HTML conventions that provides typography, forms, buttons, tables, grids, and navigation for a website.

skill.skl_description: Ajax is a group of interrelated web development methods used on the client-side to create asynchronous web applications.
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used to describe the presentation (that is, the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.

iOS (formerly iPhone OS) is Apple Inc.'s mobile operating system. Originally developed for the iPhone, it has since been extended to support other Apple, Inc. devices such as the iPod Touch, iPad, and Apple TV.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
JavaServer Pages (JSP) is a Java technology that helps software developers serve dynamically generated web pages based on HTML, XML, or other document types.
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.

Symfony is a web application framework written in PHP which follows the model-view-controller (MVC) paradigm. Released under the MIT license, Symfony is free software. The symfony-project.com website launched on October 18, 2005.
Apache Wicket, commonly referred to as Wicket, is a lightweight component-based web application framework for the Java programming language conceptually similar to JavaServer Faces and Tapestry.

experience.exp_comment:
VanillaSys is an innovative, intelligent company, with principles and values, that is passionate about development of new technologies. Always looking to maximize your investment and generate added value to your business by means of the quality of services and products, which are the essence in everything we do. Moreover, we understand that developing software is a multidisciplinary activity, so the focus of our service model includes more efficient technologies, methodologies and processes, in addition to having expert collaborators in different areas, all this guaranteed through our system of recruitment, selection and training of professionals in each field.

Over the period of time we have been on the market, we have managed to meet the needs of our customers, exceeding their expectations by far. This has led to the rapid growth of the company, as well as the expansion of our services to other vital hubs on ICTs.

Within our main goals is the production of B2B and B2C Software

OFAC List: Internal application developed with Struts2, Maven, log4j, Servlets, JSP, CSS, jQuery.

BOE Admin: Developed in Wicket, Maven, Jenkins, RESTful Services, Spring, BOE sdk.

Design and code modules for the main gusanito.com page using PHP, MySql, Ajax, CSS, JavaScript, Smarty. I developed a new version for the web site using PHP, Drupal and Scrum methodology. I did stress tests to the server with SMPP protocol. The application was coded done with java threads. Also code and design for the gusanito blog http://blog.gusanito.com
Develop internal web sites using PHP, MySQL, AJAX, JavaScript, CSS.
Design and Code modules for the Timesheet application system using PHP, MySql, Ajax JavaScript and MySql. Also develop some applications for the administration of the portal web page of the company.

skill.skl_description: Hibernate is an object-relational mapping (ORM) library for the Java language, providing a framework for mapping an object-oriented domain model to a traditional relational database.

HTML5 is a language for structuring and presenting content for the World Wide Web, and is a core technology of the Internet originally proposed by Opera Software. It is the fifth revision of the HTML standard.

Java Platform, Enterprise Edition or Java EE is widely used platform for server programming in the Java programming language. The Java platform (Enterprise Edition) differs from the Java Standard Edition Platform (Java SE) in that it adds libraries which provide functionality to deploy
Java Platform, Standard Edition or Java SE is a widely used platform for programming in the Java language.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
Magento 2 is a new release of the Magento eCommerce platform.
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
Apex is a Java-like programming language for the Force.com platform.
The Spring Framework is an open source application framework and Inversion of Control container for the Java platform.

ag_description:
We are a team of top full-stack developers, engineers, architects, and consultants. You've found the team that is able to create software for your original ideas, solve your problem. Even the most difficult one.

SmartPeople. The name of our company is not just advertising. It obliges each dev of our team to be the best in IT-technologies. The original, unexpected, intellectually-powerful solutions - that's what distinguishes our team from other market players. Experienced and talented. SmartPeople experts able to produce software solutions that help our customers to be the best in their business field.

Experienced professionals, you are welcome to the SmartPeople team:
 
* Business systems
* Social Media/Marketing tools
* Different Ad sites  
* Analytical projects (High scalable systems for handling  Big Data)
* SaaS applications
* Security and scalability
* 3rd Party API Integration

Get the best! Work with the best! Offers the best! SmartPeople.
dev_blurb:
Over more than 10 years, I've developed many web applications of different complexities in Python, Scala, HTML5 and JavaScript. I possess wide experience as both a Team Leader and Project Manager.

Primary Aims:
1. Provide projects on time
2. Be mindful of customer needs
3. Create scalable, easy extensible and excellent quality code and software design
4. Develop highly advanced, fluid and comprehensive projects.

Preferable technologies:
1. JavaScript (Angular, Angular 2, React, WebGL)
2. Python (Django, Flask, SLQAlchemy)
3. Elixir (OTP, Phoenixframework)
4. Java 8 (Akka etc, Flink, Spark)
5. Scala (Play!2, Akka etc, Flink, Spark)
6. DB (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, InfluxDB)
7. Valid, Semantic and Responsive Layout (HTML5, xHTML, CSS2/CSS3)

I have also have extensive experience in SCRUM (Agile) Management methodologies. I would be happy to discuss your goals with you further via Skype, and look forward to collaborating with your organization.

Semeyon was an absolute pleasure to work with. Not only was he capable of working on all parts of the stack, his ability to create front-end, interactive visualization tech leveraging d3 and other viz-tech was absolutely incredible.

He made himself available at most hours of the day and even scheduled last minute, unscheduled meetings when we had high-priority items that needed prompt fixing. Likewise, he integrated perfectly into our Agile process and completed objectives within estimated / target timelines -- something that's invaluable when effectively developing release timelines.

I look forward to continuing to build a successful company so that I can again have the privilege of working with Semeyon, he's a true asset to any development team.

skill.skl_description: Akka is an open-source toolkit and runtime simplifying the construction of concurrent and distributed applications on the JVM. Akka supports multiple programming models for concurrency, but it emphasizes actor-based concurrency, with inspiration drawn from Erlang.

Analytics is the discovery and communication of meaningful patterns in data. Especially valuable in areas rich with recorded information, analytics relies on the simultaneous application of statistics, computer programming and operations research to quantify performance.

AngularJS is an open-source web application framework, maintained by Google and community, that assists with creating single-page applications, one-page web applications that only require HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the client side.
Asynchronous I/O, or non-blocking I/O, is a form of input/output processing that permits other processing to continue before the transmission has finished.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.

Python is a general-purpose, high-level programming language whose design philosophy emphasizes code readability. Python claims to combine "remarkable power with very clear syntax", and its standard library is large and comprehensive.
React is an open-source JavaScript library for creating user interfaces that aims to address challenges encountered in developing single-page applications.
Scala is a multi-paradigm programming language designed to integrate features of object-oriented programming and functional programming.
WebGL (Web Graphics Library) is a JavaScript API for rendering interactive 3D graphics and 2D graphics within any compatible web browser without the use of plug-ins.

PHP (CakePHP), JavaScript(Prototype, jQuery), MySQL, xHTML + CSS2

skill.skl_description: AngularJS is an open-source web application framework, maintained by Google and community, that assists with creating single-page applications, one-page web applications that only require HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the client side.
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used to describe the presentation (that is, the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used to describe the presentation (that is, the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.

Dojo Toolkit is an open source modular JavaScript library (or more specifically JavaScript toolkit) designed to ease the rapid development of cross-platform, JavaScript/Ajax-based applications and web sites.

Java is a programming language and a core component of Oracle Corporation's Java Platform. The language derives much of its syntax from C and C++ but has a simpler object model and fewer low-level facilities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.

jQuery is a cross-browser JavaScript library designed to simplify the client-side scripting of HTML. Its syntax is designed to make it easier to navigate a document, select DOM elements, create animations, handle events, and develop Ajax applications.

Mobile application development is the process by which application software is developed for low-power handheld devices, such as personal digital assistants, enterprise digital assistants or mobile phones.

Bootstrap is a front-end toolkit for rapidly developing web applications from the developers of Twitter. It is a collection of CSS and HTML conventions that provides typography, forms, buttons, tables, grids, and navigation for a website.

experience.exp_comment: develop enterprise product

dev_blurb: Technology Consultant, Entrepreneur, Passionate Techie. Loves Javascript & Java, Expert on NodeJS, SailsJS, AngularJS, Parse.com, Android, React, Flux, Redux. Proficient with both SQL and No-SQL, having worked on MySQL, Oracle 11g, PgSql, MongoDB and now experimenting with elastic search. Has built cool stuffs with WebRTC, Socket.IO and PeerJS . Fan of Peer to Peer computing and Real-time applications. Average on plain PHP, HTML, CSS (Improving). Now learning iOS (swift) also. Have worked as SAP ABAP consultant and Data Warehousing Consultant before entering into Web/Mobile Technologies. Recently got a chance to work on Robot Operating System (ROS) for an interesting robotics project which controls robots over internet in realtime. Has worked with .NET stack (C#.NET and Windows Mobile 6.5) 3 years ago, though not much interested in it.
